summary: Makes disarm effects have no effect on the player and any companions.
descriptionHtml:
Disarm is one of the most annoying effects in the game, so this mod simply prevents it from working on the player or any current companions.

Only the following six magic effects are edited:
DragonVoiceDisarmEffect
PerkDisarmEffect
PerkTrickShotDisarm
VoiceDisarmEffect01
VoiceDisarmEffect02
VoiceDisarmEffect03

This mod will work on anything using those effects (including creatures from other mods or DLC) , but other magic effects using the disarm archetype will not be affected.

My other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24445/]SPERG[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37222]Cunning Linguist[/url]
author: seorin
